question: i dont wear pants anymore i wanted to know if it is ok in shariah to wear pants or a suit with a tie to work.
answer:
QUESTION

i am a university graduate and i got my first job . The employer requires me to wear a dress pant and a shirt to work everyday except friday.

i dont wear pants anymore i wanted to know if it is ok in shariah to wear pants or a suit with a tie to work.

ANSWER


Share:

If your employer requires you to wear shirt and pants to work, you may do so.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
